Give
















You are hereSSU Home ›  
Give






Your Imprint on the Future
Your loyalty means great opportunities for current and future Sonoma State University students. We rely upon the generous support of alumni and friends to sustain our academic programs. Your gift will help us provide the resources we need to ensure the finest quality of education, innovative programs, talented faculty and staff and state-of-the-art facilities. 





















    Declare your Support

Memorial and Honorary Gifts




Any gift to Sonoma State University may be specifically designated “in memory of” or “in honor of” loved ones, family members, friends, faculty members, classmates or those who have made a lasting impact on the lives of you or others. Memorial and honorary gifts may be submitted by fax or mail on our SSU Gift Form. 



 






Endowments




Endowments are permanent assets that are invested to provide both current and future revenue streams to support the academic mission of the University. Endowments can be established to provide financial support for scholarships, professorships, academic programs, athletic and performing arts programs, and more. To establish an endowment at SSU, the minimum initial contribution level is $25,000.



 






Scholarships




Scholarships serve a major role in providing necessary funding for Sonoma State students who have demonstrated academic excellence. The Scholarship Office currently administers more than 200 separate funds that provide approximately 400 distinct scholarship awards. More than 54 percent of the student body receives financial aid, and 27 percent receives assistance from scholarships or grants. Without this valuable and vital support, these students would be unable to attend SSU. The minimum scholarship awarded is $250.
